CustomField.description: This setting allows you to specify the number of times a user can retake a quiz in order to pass it. For example, if you set the number of retakes allowed to 3, a user will have up to 3 attempts to pass the quiz.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This setting allows you to specify the number of times a user can retake a quiz in order to pass it. For example, if you set the number of retakes allowed to 3, a user will have up to 3 attempts to pass the quiz.
CustomField.label: Number of Retakes Allowed
